posts.postText: My name is sageboba (some of you probably know me as lenny), i've been playing on the NNJG TTT server for quite a awhile now, but i never got around to going on the forums, until now. So i just wanted to say hi!

I know you've been here for quite a while now, probably for 4-6 months or so?

Anyways, welcome to the forums!
Herro Lenno! Glad to see more regulars on the forums :D
Lenny, you've been knifing me on TTT for a while now, good to see you on the forums.
I sure have destar, i sure have.
